feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated servers] - 45D24
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 3, 22:00 UTC  -  Apr 6, 04:00 UTC

Mar 18, 01:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/04/2022 22:00 UTC
End time : 06/04/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unreachable during operations (30 minutes per server).
Service improvement : Following the failure of an altigo (power supply and server reboot equipment) for which we have no spare, we have to relocate the servers to a compatible rack.

entry.title: [BHS1/GRA2/RBX1/ERI1][Dedicated servers] - Upgrade RTvRack
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 30, 08:00 - 23:59 UTC

Mar 28, 18:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 30/03/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 30/03/2022 23:59 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In regard to our lifecycle management, we need to upgrade all RTvRack exchanger to a new version in order to have a homogeneous park.

entry.title: [ER11][Private Network] - E101A14
entry.content:
Mar 28, 22:23 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 28/03/2022 20:00 UTC
End Time : 28/03/2022 22:18 UTC
Service impact : The sitch has been replaced. Service is working as expected at this time.
Root cause : A water leak in the rack caused this issue.

Mar 28, 20:30 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 28/03/2022 20:00UTC
Service impact : Vrack is unavailable in the rack. All the servers are unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our technicians are replacing a vRack switch impacted.

entry.title: [GRA2][Dedicated Servers] - vRack network - G251A05
entry.content:
Mar 25, 21:02 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/03/2022 20:03 UTC
End Time : 25/03/2022 20:55 UTC
Service impact : The vRack network is back in operation on the G251A05 rack
Root cause : Hardware failure on the vRack switch

Mar 25, 20:36 UTC
Update - We estimate the vRack network will be back online at 21:30 UTC

Mar 25, 20:23 UTC
Identified - The switch connecting the rack is defective. A replacement is in progress

Mar 25, 20:08 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 25/03/2022 20:03 UTC
Service impact : vRack network unavailable in rack G251A05
Ongoing actions : Our teams investigate to determine the origin of the incident

entry.title: [RBX2][NAS HA] - Difficulty to access
entry.content:
Mar 25, 14:43 UTC
Resolved - NAS HA service is fully operational at the Roubaix datacenter

Start Time : 25/03/2022 10:30 UTC
End Time : 25/03/2022 14:42 UTC
Root cause : A network connector has failed.
Our technical teams replaced the connector

Mar 25, 13:52 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 25/03/2022 10:30 UTC
Service impact : We are experiencing difficulties in accessing NAS-HA services
Ongoing actions : Our teams investigate to understand the origin of the degradation
